Adverse_Effects.text:
Red Man Syndrome
: Flushing, rash, itching, hypotension during IV infusion; prevent with slow infusion.
Nephrotoxicity
: Kidney damage, especially with high doses or concurrent nephrotoxic drugs; monitor renal function.
Ototoxicity
: Hearing loss or tinnitus, more common with high levels or prolonged use.
Hematologic Effects
: Neutropenia, thrombocytopenia, or anemia; usually reversible.
Hypersensitivity Reactions
: Rash, fever, or severe reactions like Stevens-Johnson syndrome.
Gastrointestinal Issues
: Nausea, vomiting, diarrhea (more with oral use).
Other
: Phlebitis, elevated liver enzymes, or superinfections.
